original_text: By faith Noah, when warned about things not yet seen, in holy fear built an ark to save his family. By his faith he condemned the world and became heir of the righteousness that is in keeping with faith.
korean_text: 믿음으로 노아는 아직 보이지 않는 일에 경고하심을 받아 경외함으로 방주를 준비하여 그 집을 구원하였으니 이로 말미암아 세상을 정죄하고 믿음을 따르는 의의 상속자가 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: when warned about things not yet seen,
sentences.korean_translation: 아직 보이지 않는 것들에 대해 경고받았을 때,

sentences.original_text: in holy fear built an ark
By his faith he condemned the world
and became heir of the righteousness
that is in keeping with faith.
